entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30046 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #308
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30045 | .NET Remote code Execution Vulnerability #307
  • .NET May 2024 Updates #306

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Avoiding Duplication for Random.GetItems #102229
  • Crash on Rosetta for double mapping jitted code #102226
  • [API Proposal]: Regex Streaming Mode #102221
  • net7.0-ios16.1 depends on non-existent Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Ref 7.0.20 #102214
  • "Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces, Version=1.0.0.0" in tests on Debian #102213
  • [Console]::Beep() does not activate "Bell Notifications" #102211
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30045 | .NET Remote code Execution Vulnerability #102206
  • Error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797. #102205
  • [HttpStress] `HttpIOException` with `HttpRequestError=Unknown` and `QuicError=OperationAborted` on Windows #102202
    9.0.0
  • SubjectAlternativeNameBuilder.AddDnsName throws ArgumentException #102201
  • [wasm] we should use instantiateStreaming #102200
  • ilasm produces wrong SequencePoints when a method references several Documents #102198
  • EventSource event with 4 string parameters with null values behaves inconsistent in .NET 8 #102197
  • [browser][MT] mono_download_assets - RangeError: Start offset -1 is outside the bounds of the buffer #102196
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests - Could not allocate #102195
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add MediaTypeNames.Text.EventStream for server-sent events #102194
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonPropertyFlag to System.Text.Json.Serialization to signal Property existence in Deserialize objects. #102186
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests Regressions #102203

Closed

  • Use another Core Assembly with `PersistedAssemblyBuilder` #101018
    9.0.0
  • Space before AM/PM in the en-US locale changed from regular (0x0020) to non-breaking (0x202f) #102220
  • Generate asmparse.c using a standard bison/yacc #4776
    Future
  • App using Powershell.SDK fails to run, when building as SingleFile #102193
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(genRegMask(initReg) & intRegState.rsCalleeRegArgMaskLiveIn) == 0' in win-x86 #102161
    9.0.0
  • MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method #98730
    9.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator, .NET 7: possible error in the 'Equals' method implementation #78145
    7.0.x
  • [browser][MT] Multithreading and JavaScript async interop in .NET 9 #85592
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Reflection.Tests - Assertion: sgen-scan-object.h:93 #100932
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] GC deadlock #96190
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] TIMED_OUT but 0 was expected #99888
    9.0.0
  • `NullReferenceException` with bulk memory copy helper on win-x86 #102138
    9.0.0
  • dotnet 7.0.4 (iOS): NullReferenceException in Socket-related code (originating from Http2Connection disposal) #87031
  • [7.0] tvos arm64 mono: Failed to list devices #84394
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Linux_bionic arm64 failure in Convert.cs causing FormatException in System.Diagnostics.Process tests #88756
    7.0.x
  • [OCSP Stapling] Cached bad response of Server-Side OCSP stabling in .NET7 Linux #89907
    8.0.0
  • Internal CLR error on 7.0.307 and 7.0.400 SDK #91695
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Remove Try versions of ReadGlobal* on target #102230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor IV opts a bit #102228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate VNF_PtrToLoc(lcl, offset) as GT_LCL_ADDR node #102227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify convertDoubleToUInt64 #102225
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some issues around accessing invalid blocks for Number.BigInteger #102224
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add FrozenSet.Create collection builder #102223
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove `RequiresPreviewFeatures` attribute on `Lock`, add test using the `lock` keyword #102222
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] make MarshalerType enum const #102219
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement Math's DotProduct* APIs #102218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser][MT] tests #102212
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Move CORINFO_HELP_BULK_WRITEBARRIER to a pre-Lower phase #102209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #102208
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #102207
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security
  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the register conflict of the `REG_GSCOOKIE_TMP` and the `FastTailCall target register`. #102192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable APC by default #102191
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][workloads] Check downlevel runtime versions #102190
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] added simple reverse pinvoke support to interpreter #102185
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] optimize condition on mono_log_debug #102184
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Added cases to reuse the set if comparer matches #102182
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Expose the FusedMultiplyAdd and MultiplyAddEstimate APIs on relevant vector and scalar types #102181
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • ILASM: Add simple `README.md`describing how to use Bison to generate the ILASM parser. #102217
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #102083
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport "Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform" #102097
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Spanify some ``Utf8String`` and ``Utf8StringBuilder`` use #102101
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow using pinvoke registers in the prolog #102165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ARM64 LLVM AOT runtime builds to use the generic libclang.so file #102175
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Unify `GT_JMP` handling in the backends #102117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NRE in bulk memmove on x86 #102171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix name mangling for CoreLib #102183
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reapply keyword `params` #101499
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SVE: Added `LoadVectorx2`, `LoadVectorx3`, `LoadVectorx4` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride validation error #101246
    area-System.Reflection
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute #102176
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Fix ulong->double conversion on x64 (without avx512f) #102179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Suppress export name minification #102155
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [workloads] Bump downlevel runtime produced package versions in the workload manifest #101806
    area-Workloads
  • Remove reflection from FrameworkDescription #102164
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Backport #92375 #102172
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Remove `linux-arm` as a supported RID in .NET8 #102072
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Reorder stores to make them amenable to stp optimization #102133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JSMarshalAs JSType Adjust comments and type parameters #101981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, needs-author-action, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add ProbeLoongArch64Quirks() for R2RDump tool. #102146
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink_links_simple_app_without_analysis_warnings_and_it_runs failing in 8.0.1xx #40882
  • Support a new launch profile type to launch the project in a container #40880
  • Many tools in the SDK repo are producing packages #40871
  • DotNet Publish, specify versions as parameter won't reflected in MSIX #40879
  • Unexpected NETSDK1210 after removing TFM #40870
  • Download cmake failure when running restore.cmd #40859
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]After installing net9preview4SDK on the arm64OS, create the MStest project and run dotnet test. The generated log is x64. #40857
  • .NET SDK 6.0.421 (x64) keeps asking to make changes to my device #40856

Closed

  • Root .resources.dll from transitive PackageReference not copied to build output #40834
    9.0.1xx
  • [Workload Sets] ensure that users can get a full listing of all installed workloads (including multiple versions) #37828
  • Update logic for how workload version is displayed #40005
  • `--no-restore` should specify `-restore:false` when calling MSBuild to override response file arguments #39821
    9.0.1xx
  • .NET 8.0 error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.ubuntu.22.04-x64. No packages exist with this id in source(s): nuget.org #40676
  • Workload ID maui-android is not recognized #38171
    Discussion
  • Not able to install MAUI on ArchLinux system #40576

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back missing PGO properties after installer->sdk repo consolidation #40886
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport PR to use latest MSBuild on core #40883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #40875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #40874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #40876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #40872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Have --no-restore imply -restore:false to override any response file command-line arguments #40579
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Reference latest MSBuild for netcore MSBuild stuff #40603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Port changes from VS where we stopped using custom tracing event arguments class based on BinaryFormatter #40849
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Fix DisableWorkloadResolverSentinelPath on .NET Framework #40787
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [VMR] Skip Publish Scenario Test Results for dev versions job #40860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Don't force base image manifests to have a mediaType #40776
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Anonymous Interface Objects #4301

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify caller-info behavior in partial properties/indexers #8127
  • Remove mentions of extension inheritance and interfaces #8126

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Report warning when Main method is updated #73472
  • Intellisense References not showing correctly when using a Primary-Constructor #73469

Closed

  • Trying to jump out of local function after a using declaration causes internal error: 'given key was not present in dictionary' #73397
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34913.43 #73460

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #73478
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Report external build errors using the platform's diagnostic brokered #73477
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename public API based on API review decision #73476
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid enumeration allocations in formatting #73475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary full tree walks in the simplifier system #73473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ref count the HubClient and ServiceBrokerClient #73467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure that when EnC finishes that it disposes the OOP connection it is holding onto #73465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement keyword recommenders for `allows ref struct` constraint #73463
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Use TextDocumentChangeRegistrationOptions for didChange registration #73462
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add runtime references to the devkit component output directory #73461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Net9 Reference Assemblies #73423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to cleaner patterns than explicit Task.Run #73471
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Properly dispose the SymbolSearchEngine #73464
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update local deployment instructions #73417
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove virtual from 'SourceMethodSymbolWithAttributes.SyntaxNode' #73433
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Stop overbuilding SemanticSearch.ReferenceAssemblies #73468
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused parts of RemoteHostClient #73466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Recognize 'allows ref struct' constraint in VB compiler #73429
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add "First-class Span Types" feature status #73446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Test local functions with goto out of scope #73402
    Area-Compilers, Test-Gap, untriaged, Next
  • Remove array allocations for formatting rules. #73458
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: attributes #73437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2451076 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Add more "ref in async" tests #73444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Improve Blazor Server reconnect UI #55721
  • Add an InputHidden component for Blazor #55720
  • minimal api-- FromQuery problem for complex object #55719
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55718
  • Perf improvement: json #55717
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30046 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #55714
  • Incorrect HTTP/3 error code for malformed requests with invalid pseudo-header #55712
  • Blazor 8.0 SSR throws "System.InvalidOperationException: No converter registered for type" when model class contains a constructor with parameters #55711
  • In .NET 8 / 9 ASP.NET Razor Class Library (RCL) views that use "partial" tag helper won't render nested views when referenced from ASP.NET Razor Pages app #55710
  • Group claim duplication when using Negotiate authentication on Linux AD domain member with LDAP #55705
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext_spring #55704
  • ASP0018 analyzer does not respect FormatFilterAttribute for {format} route parameter #55702
  • EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter, please provide one of these. #55701

Closed

  • React to https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/101461 (System.IO.Pipelines) #55342
  • TP Worker threads dead-lock in `Http2OutputProducer.Stop()` method #54174
  • UpgradeCode of .Net hosting bundle 8.0.0 installer does not work #55697
  • OOM copying a file to memory in Blazor #55694
  • IStringLocalizer error: Input string was not in a correct format #55706
  • Render sequence seems to be incorrect #55703
  • ability to override `CssClass` property in `InputBase<T>` #55684
  • Blazor bypasses running client Program.cs and client side DI fails #55648
  • In Blazor, an input field with type="email" incorrectly converts extended ASCII characters in Google Chrome #55632
  • Blazor hot reloading not working with referenced assembly #55601
  • Add an API to tell you the current render mode #49401
    9.0-preview5
  • Blazor SSR stream rendering not working when i deploy to nginx server on linux #55660
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #55676
  • Perf regression: json, json, mvc #55669

PullRequests

Created

  • Make LinearSearchJumpTable use span.Equals which is much faster than string.Compare #55724
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [browser] Support separation hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #55716
    area-blazor, arch-wasm
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #55715
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #55713
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update LdapAdapter.cs #55707
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • [Blazor] Add an API to describe the render mode (if any) a component is running in #55577
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • ALWAYS include the Vary Accept-Encoding header when response compression is enabled #55092
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 9.0-preview5
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking

Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash: Window was already deactivated #22406
  • Rewrite TableView handlers so they aren't based on ListViewRenderers #22405
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Improper Insert Behavior on ListView for Windows #22393
  • Right To Left flow direction is not applied to the ListView on the Mac and iOS platforms. #22391
  • [MAUI] [WinUI] App crashes when using the startup task ability #22387
  • [WinUI] Application.Current.CloseWindow Crash When AppWindow.Hide is called in .Net Maui 9.0 Prev 3 #22386
    9.0-preview5
  • Epic: Add new SetBinding API for defining "compiled" bindings in code #22384
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • Cannot update maui workload. #22407
  • RadioButton TextColor doesn't change iOS/MacCatalyst #19943
  • Two radio buttons in group - set is checked of one of them in run time not worked #8971
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex
  • [arcade] Move to arcade 8.0 for main #22400
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Update to net9 preview5 #22399
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor

Merged

  • Add (back) VSMac feedback tool mention when move-to-vs-feedback label is applied #22385
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Update policy/workflow automation to use new area labels #22410
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump issue Template to include SR5 #22408
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area-drawing, area-controls-border
  • Fix null handling in UpdateIndicatorLayout method (#22361) #22382
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add provisioning mono back #22395
  • [release/9.0.0-preview4] Update versions #22392

Updated

  • Fix frame ping #22347
    area-layout
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    community ✨, stale, area-controls-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area-templates
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • [Trimming] Add ILC compilation test of all assemblies #22328
    area-publishing
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-perf, t/perf
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    area-drawing, community ✨, t/perf
  • MenuItem gets updated when IconImageSource changes - Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨, area-controls-menubar, stale, t/desktop, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program. #33716
  • MaterializationInterceptors causes More than twenty 'IServiceProvider' instances #33714
  • Use Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore & Oracle.EntityFrameworkCore get a ORA-00904: "FALSE": invalid identifier #33712

Closed

  • Add analyzer for loading navigation #33713
  • Explicit Interface Members and NotMapped] #33675
  • Severing required navigation deletes the dependent entity #33703
  • How can i cancel the asp.net core field plus "s" behavior when I execute complex query #33693

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly initialize design-time relational model for externally built models #33719
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.38.1 to 3.39.1 #33711
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #33718
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #33717

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33694
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Progress description truncated in Dotnet SDK Installer #19740

Closed

  • "dotnet5" channel brings 6.0.0 #8307
